tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctors ar very friendly and professional.
They check on every interval if we are comfortable with the treatment, or if we need a break. They explain the process post the treatment is started, and once they complete the treatment they let us know on what needs to be followed 
until our next sitting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Honestly I was really sceptical about RCT treatment, but once I met Dr. Uday I was pretty sure that I am in safe hands. He not only discussed my oral health issues but also elaborated about the overall process and steps to keep the teeth in a healthy state. I would definitely recommend Dr. Uday for not only RCT treatment but also other dental related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: my wife is in need of tooth replacement. Dr. Kamath had explained the need and procedure of the treatment very precisely. he was very friendly and gave genuine suggestions. the treatment is very satisfactory. he takes follow up every now and then.  my wife is all smiles now. highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It‚Äôs the comfortable and friendly environment at the clinic which made me feel more confident and happy rather than being anxious and scared.
Dr Uday Kamath, Dr Pramod and Dr Meghna was friendly and helped me overcome my fear as it was my first RCT.
They explained clearly what the issue and how long the process will take. 
One of the best dental care clinic.
